name: Nginx-add-user
tagline: This interactive script will make the linux user, set the homepath, make the nginx and php fpm files, add an database for this linux user and add the domain to the mail server database
body:
Nginx-add-user
==============

This interactive script will make the linux user, set the homepath, make the nginx and php fpm files, add an database for this linux user and add the domain to the mail server database
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
